short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The ultimate product to increase the productivity for the portal!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Web Portal v2 is an experimental app used to boost the productivity on the portal! Not only is it useful for accessing and using the portal, but it works great in the school and work environment. It has many great features including the ability to surf, work, and edit on the portal!
